verses.roman:
ebe tomāra pādābje upajibe bhakti
tathi lāgi' kari tomāra caraṇe praṇati"

synonyms: ebe—now; tomāra—Your; pāda-abje—to the lotus feet; upajibe—will grow; bhakti—devotional service; tathi lāgi'-for that reason; kari—I do; tomāra caraṇe praṇati—humble obeisances at Your lotus feet.
translation: "Henceforward I shall certainly develop devotional service unto Your lotus feet. For this reason I have come to You and have fallen down at Your lotus feet."
